participant_1.background:
I am content with being a welder and rock climber.
i once ran the mile in under 4 minutes.
i am a professional bowler.
I live in the suburbs because it is a quiet place where I can relax and enjoy my family and friends.
i often do not have the money to pay my utility bills.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy quiet activities in my free time, like reading, writing, and spending time in nature.
I listen to Bruno Mars' music and reminisce about the good times I had playing sports with my family and friends when I was younger.
I miss the weather in my old hometown, but I'm starting to appreciate the change of seasons here.
i like playing badminton.
My relationship with my boss is still in its early stages.

content.text: Hi there, what are your interests?
I enjoy quiet activities, like reading, writing, and spending time in nature.
That's nice, I like to spend time in nature as well. What do you like to read?
I like to read different genres, but I recently read a book called The Martian, by Andy Weir. It was a really good book.
I've heard good things about that book, but I haven't read it yet. I'll have to add it to my list.
Yes, you should! It's a really good story. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I really enjoy science fiction and fantasy. I also like to read historical fiction and thrillers.
I like to read historical fiction and thrillers as well. I've been meaning to read more science fiction and fantasy, though.
I think you'd like science fiction and fantasy. There are a lot of great books out there in those genres.
I'll have to check out some of your recommendations.
You should! I'm sure you'd find some books you like
